backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing chatrooms, messages, users, reactions, and access control with admin‑gated operations and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required UI and data‑flow changes for admin reset functionality and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, global layout, and admin‑hidden header/footer behavior.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, searching, or removing user avatars with Giphy integration and upload validation.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat UI handling message display, auto‑scroll, replies, header collapse, and sending messages with media support.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails, live status, and optional Twitter/Twitch previews.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog to create chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or URL support including Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation, avatar picker, and editable username.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op component returning nothing to avoid authentication flows.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, pinning, replies, and optional Twitter rendering.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Input box for sending messages with image upload, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter media support, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component for playing voice messages with waveform visualization, time tracking, and synchronized playback control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, users, and reactions, including local user metadata utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theming variables, dark mode, layout rules, and custom styles such as voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API key and result limits.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility to format large numbers into compact notation such as k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Helpers for searching and fetching trending GIFs from the Giphy API with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file placeholder for html2canvas loader functionality.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression that resizes images, maintains quality, and returns a smaller File when beneficial.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed JSON to produce a safe preview with text, author info, and optional image, including caching and deduping.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Provides localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, expiration, and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions to extract IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generate corresponding thumbnails or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page providing password-protected access to list, delete, and reset chatrooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments view count, handles loading and error states, and renders the chat interface.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Renders the chat lobby with search, category filters, loading/error states, and chatroom list navigation.
frontend/src/types/message.ts: Defines a frontend message type converting reaction data into a simplified structure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state and feature requests focused on implementing a full data reset action with frontend admin gating.
